text: Aur jo shaks ghulaam na paye woh do mahine ke pai dar pai (consecutively) rozey rakkhey qabl iske ke dono ek dusre ko haath lagayein aur jo ispar bhi qadir na ho woh 60 miskeeno ko khana khilaye. Yeh hukum isliye diya ja raha hai ke tum Allah aur uske Rasool par iman lao. Yeh Allah ki mukarrar ki hui hadein (bounds) hain, aur kafiron ke liye dardnaak saza hai
